settings.title: Our Packaging
settings.subheading: Not content with making our products #naturallydifferent, we thought we’d do it to our packaging too.

settings.text:
Not
content with making our products #naturallydifferent, we thought we’d do it
with our packaging too.

settings.code:
Our Story

One-of-a-kind-tech accessories.
Handcrafted from nature's finest materials.

Since 2009 we've been trying to do something a little different. In an industry consisting of a sea of sameness, we craft one-of-a-kind tech accessories from nature's finest materials. Our goal is that every Cover-Up product gives a sense of individuality that matches your own. From wood and stone to wool felt, our products feature a uniqueness and long lasting quality that can only be found in our natural surroundings.

settings.subtitle: OUR MISSION
settings.title: Creating different
settings.text:
We’ve always considered ourselves makers at our core.

Build to last. No flashy logos. No senseless details. Let the materials do the talking. Our products are made naturally and designed simply. But you'd never call them boring.

Tired of accessories that looked the same, we decided to create our own. Something different. And thanks to nature, every case, skin or desk pad we make is different, each with it's own unique pattern, texture or patina.

So we’re not kidding when we say they're one-of-a-kind.

settings.subtitle: Materials Matter
settings.title: Better materials, better products
settings.text:
Nature sits at the heart of our story. Surrounded by miles of beaches, woodlands and mountains in every direction, we use the best of what it has to offer.

From wood, stone, seashell and merino wool to leather. Our patterns and patinas are the real deal, not printed on.

We make products that will last for the long haul. Day by day, each piece develops it's own character, getting even better with age. Our cases and skins often outlast our customers phones and MacBooks.

settings.subtitle: OUR PROCESS
settings.title: Crafted in Wales (by us)
settings.text:
We choose quality over quantity. Quality matters. We don’t make a big thing of it, but our customers know and appreciate the difference.  

From our small workshop that we call home our products are designed and manufactured by us. Not far away factories. Just people who care.

And, we sweat the small stuff. Small things matter. They add up. Then, they turn into big things.

settings.subtitle: MADE RESPONSIBLY
settings.title: We use only the good stuff
settings.text:
We might only be small but we know we can have a big impact. In an industry where most products are made from plastic, we decided to take a different path through the forest.

We love to do more with less because everyone knows that less is more. Through our products, processes and packaging we're on a journey towards having a positive impact on the planet.

settings.subtitle: DOING THINGS THE RIGHT WAY
settings.title: Happiness Guarantee
settings.text:
We think our products look even better in person than they do on screen. And we stand behind everything we make.

Not completely happy with your purchase? Just let us know - our Happiness Guarantee has you covered.
Be the first to know about all things Cover-Up — think special releases, first access to limited editions and sale events. Yup, all the good stuff. Put your name on the list here.
